PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-10982000-07-270,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisOrder requesting the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA to audit and report on the reconciliation to be made comparing the aggregate of interim payments made to the KAMLOOPS INDIAN BAND in a year to the actual tax reported in that same year, pursuant to the agreement concerning the collection of taxes by the federal government on behalf of the First Nation.
Attachments
precis:
Order requesting the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA to audit and report on the
reconciliation to be made comparing the aggregate of interim payments made
to the KAMLOOPS INDIAN BAND in a year to the actual tax reported in that
same year, pursuant to the agreement concerning the collection of taxes
by the federal government on behalf of the First Nation.
